医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
1 型糖尿病患者体重管理降糖药物处方数量增加从 2010 年到 2023 年，GLP-1RA 和 SGLT2 抑制剂治疗 1 型糖尿病的处方量不断增加，特别是对于患有肥胖和心肾风险的患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Rise-in-weight-management-glucose-lowering-drug-prescriptions-in-type-1-diabetes-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Rise-in-weight-management-glucose-lowering-drug-prescriptions-in-type-1-diabetes-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43bb0a46-7504-4df1-8c4a-096b0564d2b0 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 11:54:00 -0400 Rise in weight-management glucose-lowering drug prescriptions in type 1 diabetes patients
女性口腔健康对整体健康的重要性女性的口腔健康不仅仅是美丽的笑容，它是整体健康的一个经常被忽视的重要方面。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/The-importance-of-womens-oral-health-in-overall-wellbeing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/The-importance-of-womens-oral-health-in-overall-wellbeing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a644bd40-7cff-42fa-9d4b-1f1c10a0b8e8 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 10:53:00 -0400 The importance of women's oral health in overall wellbeing
人工智能工具可改善女性的产妇护理结果一项大型研究回顾发现，在使用人工智能和其他临床软件工具的情况下，女性更有可能在怀孕期间得到良好的护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/AI-tools-improve-maternity-care-outcomes-for-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/AI-tools-improve-maternity-care-outcomes-for-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb5a97be-f127-4482-be12-dc3446f7e396 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 10:41:35 -0400 AI tools improve maternity care outcomes for women
新研究将 SHAAKE 确定为关键震荡指标脑震荡研究人员发现了一种新的脑震荡迹象，可以识别高达 33% 的未确诊脑震荡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/New-research-identizes-SHAAKE-as-key-concussion-indicator.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/New-research-identizes-SHAAKE-as-key-concussion-indicator.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2181f43-ee83-4a7d-962a-e869ffece403 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 10:06:38 -0400 New research identifies SHAAKE as key concussion indicator
研究表明脱水与 IRONMAN 运动员肌肉痉挛有关当运动员准备潜入夏威夷水域参加 10 月 26 日 IRONMAN 世界锦标赛第一部分比赛时，他们可能需要额外注意体内的水。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Study-links-deHydration-to-muscle-cramps-in-IRONMAN-athletes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Study-links-deHydration-to-muscle-cramps-in-IRONMAN-athletes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a021beb2-202b-4396-8bd8-d312c5b9de21 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 09:54:44 -0400 Study links dehydration to muscle cramps in IRONMAN athletes
英国睡眠研究人员敦促政府废除每年两次的时钟变化英国睡眠协会的一组领先睡眠研究人员呼吁政府废除英国每年两次的时钟变化，因为这对睡眠和昼夜节律健康产生不利影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/British-sleep-researchers-urge-the-government-to-abolish-twice-yearly-clock-changes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/British-sleep-researchers-urge-the-government-to-abolish-twice-yearly-clock-changes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aac0e0ea-dd7c-43d3-a24a-603c1061b2f2 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 09:47:27 -0400 British sleep researchers urge the government to abolish twice-yearly clock changes
尽管存在心血管危险因素，偏头痛仍与健康的血管系统有关该研究将心血管健康与偏头痛活动联系起来，表明较低的风险评分与较高的偏头痛可能性相关，尤其是在女性中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Migraines-linked-to-healthy-angio-system-despite-cardioangio-risk-factors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Migraines-linked-to-healthy-angio-system-despite-cardioangio-risk-factors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47f7a838-00c9-443a-be6c-c558d5d24523 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 09:01:00 -0400 Migraines linked to healthy vascular system despite cardiovascular risk factors
英国生命科学的未来始于西米德兰兹郡在本次采访中，PHTA 首席执行官吉诺·马蒂尼 (Gino Martini) 向 NewsMed 介绍了西米德兰兹郡，该地区在制造业和生命科学方面拥有丰富的传统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/The-future-of-UK-life-sciences-starts-in-the-West-Midlands.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/The-future-of-UK-life-sciences-starts-in-the-West-Midlands.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41565fc4-c83b-41e8-876b-3176ee584d09 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 08:01:00 -0400 The future of UK life sciences starts in the West Midlands
PacBio Onso™ 短读长测序仪加入 10X Genomics 兼容合作伙伴计划PacBio (PACB) 是高质量、高精度基因组测序解决方案的领先开发商，今天宣布将 Onso 短读长测序平台纳入 10x Genomics 兼容合作伙伴计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Pacbio-Onsoe284a2-short-read-sequencing-instrument-joins-10X-Genomics-known-partner-program-Pacbio.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Pacbio-Onsoe284a2-short-read-sequencing-instrument-joins-10X-Genomics-known-partner-program-Pacbio.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fff83b61-ef9a-401a-a0b1-150228f13aa3 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 07:01:00 -0400 PacBio Onso™ short read sequencing instrument joins 10X Genomics compatible partner program
您可以依靠乳房X光检查来识别心脏病风险吗？如今，当人们检查每年一次的乳房X光检查时，有些人可能会面临一个令人惊讶的问题：除了检查乳房X光检查是否有乳腺癌之外，患者还希望放射科医生检查图像以了解患心脏病的风险吗？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Can-you-rely-on-your-mammogram-to-identify-heart-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Can-you-rely-on-your-mammogram-to-identify-heart-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cce576ac-98cb-4b61-9bc3-a192a0d98361 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 06:37:13 -0400 Can you rely on your mammogram to identify heart disease risk?
